summary.para: Gets the procedure address of the specified function in the signed library.

param.name: name
param.para: The entry point name in the DLL that specifies the function.

param.name: address
param.para: Receives the address of the entry point.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: See for an example of how to create an object and call the GetProcedureAddress method.

summary.para: Provides a method that allows content protection systems to get the procedure address of a function in the signed library. This method provides the same functionality as GetProcAddress which is not available to Windows Store apps.

remarks.para: See for an example of how to create and use an IMFSignedLibrary object.
